Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1986, off Ken Dayley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1986, off Reggie Patterson (CHC)...
Injured on 4/15/1987 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/1987 with a Sprained Ankle, out for one week...
Traded from Atlanta to Philadelphia on 4/26/1989 (Going to PHI: 2B Ron Gant, CF Junior Felix. Going to ATL: P Jason Grimsley, P Mike Jackson)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1990, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,971,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Philadelphia to San Diego on 5/11/1991 (Going to SD: 2B Ron Gant. Going to PHI: 1B John Kruk, 2B Wally Backman, P Todd Van Poppel, P Ed Vosberg)...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,971,429 through salary arbitration...
6/1/1992: Signed a contract extension with San Diego, $1,600,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 4/30/1993 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from San Diego to Pittsburgh on 6/1/1993 (Going to SD: RF Vladimir Guerrero. Going to PIT: RF Ron Gant, P Kevin Tapani, P Jeff Brantley)...
